name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free B2B Contact Info by AroundDeal

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find B2B contact info & auto-convert jd to shortlist within seconds. AI recruiting and prospecting. ChatGPT-powered. Try for Free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your AI talent and B2B contact finder powered by ChatGPT 🔥
AI-analyze job requirements. AI-recommend best talents. AI talent sourcing. Find 120M+ prospects contacts. Access all LinkedIn Members even if they are outside your connections. Usable on LinkedIn, company website, CRMs and everywhere online. 

⭐️ It works for recruiters, sales reps, and all business professionals, helping you simplify your recruiting and prospecting process, access contacts faster and easier, and enhance your revenue right away.

👩🏻‍💼 For recruiters | Features highlight: 
💡 AI sourcing on LinkedIn Jobs Page: Click AroundDeal embedded button on Jobs pages, get automated talent recommendations within seconds. 
💡 AI sourcing from JD to talents: Add your job requirements and receive instant targeted recommendations. 

👨🏻‍💼For sales & all business professionals | Features highlight: 
💡 Find Emails on LinkedIn: Find Any Emails of Your Targeted Prospects.
💡 Expand LinkedIn Networks: Connect with Profiles Beyond Your LinkedIn Network.
💡 Auto-Connect: Auto-Fill in Email Addresses When LinkedIn Requires One to Connect.

🚀 Beyond LinkedIn, Where It Works Wonders!
▪️ AroundDeal on Company Website 
▪️ AroundDeal on CRM (Salesforce or HubSpot)

💻 How to use AroundDeal:
1. Install Extension to browser.
2. Log in to your account.
3. Click the extension icon or embedded button to start.
4. Start prospecting or recruiting!

🔥 Try It for Free!! 🔥 
Install now and get a free trial. It's exclusively for you: 5 free AI sourcing requests + 3 free contact credits.

🔎 AroundDeal global database's main advantages and capabilities: 
AroundDeal Extension is built upon a comprehensive global B2B database that comprises over 120 million contacts and company information. Our data is particularly focused on the Asia-Pacific (APAC) and emerging markets. 
1. 120M+ business profiles
2. 43M+ contacts in APAC and emerging market
3. 6.5M+ C-level executives
4. 95% data accuracy
5. CCPA & GDPR aligned
Our aim is to help users connect with the best-fit prospect, generate high-quality leads, and boost revenue growth for their sales, marketing, and recruiting and operation's needs. 

⚙️ Information Available in the AroundDeal database: 
1. Name
2. Location
3. Job title
4. Emails
5. Phone numbers
6. Company name
7. Company Industry
8. Company headcount
9. Company headquarters
10. Company founded year 
11. Company website
12. Company specialties
   ……
